mapper.sql: id, number, category, remarks, createid, createname, DATE_FORMAT(crttime,'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%S') crttime
mapper.insert: insert into category (id, number, category, remarks, createid, createname, crttime) values (#{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{number,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{category,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{remarks,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{createid,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{createname,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{crttime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP})

insert into category
id,
number,
category,
remarks,
createid,
createname,
crttime,

mapper.update:
update category
number = #{number,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
category = #{category,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
remarks = #{remarks,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
createid = #{createid,jdbcType=INTEGER},
createname = #{createname,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
crttime = #{crttime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}

update category set number = #{number,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, category = #{category,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, remarks = #{remarks,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, createid = #{createid,jdbcType=INTEGER}, createname = #{createname,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, crttime = #{crttime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select: SELECT FROM category order by crttime desc
